Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. FREE: Remove Stormâ€™s RALLY die. If you do, this turn when a friendly character begins a move within her range, they can use Improved Movement: Elevated for that movement.

Comments
December 28, 2021
muel0017
[QUOTE=Goop;12168825]The rally is extremely situational, you are really just paying 35 for cheap EE w/ stealth. There are far better EE xmen pieces in previous sets. Maybe for a Wakanda team she might see a little play since they are lacking a good taxi.[/QUOTE] Newsflash, all these rally abilities are situational and based on chance. The hardest part about rally die is getting the prerequisite to happen (in this case opponent rolling a 5). That is with almost every character with the Rally ability. It's not meant to make or break a team just to add to them if it happens. As for the movement part of the ability, that is not situational, if you don't have a single friendly within 7 squares of her then that's on you.
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
Yes agreed, the rally power is very situational. But it's an imaginative move that still might be fun to pull off every now and then.
November 30, 2021
Goop
The rally is extremely situational, you are really just paying 35 for cheap EE w/ stealth. There are far better EE xmen pieces in previous sets. Maybe for a Wakanda team she might see a little play since they are lacking a good taxi.
